item.title: [ERI1][Cooling System] - E102H08 / E102H09
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT May 10, 06:30 - 11:00 UTC

Apr 18, 23:21 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 10/05/2023 06:30 UTC
End time : 10/05/2023 11:00 UTC
Service impact : Racks will be unavailable during maintenance, we will only shut down one rack at a time and put it back into service before moving on to the next.
- E102H08 starts at 06:30 UTC and ends at 08:30 UTC
- E102H09 starts at 09:00 UTC and ends at 11:00 UTC
Service improvement : We need to perform preventive maintenance on our cooling system.

item.title: [RBX8][DedicatedServers] - Rack R821L13
item.description:
Apr 26, 20:36 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 26/04/2023 13:13 UTC
End Time : 26/04/2023 20:32 UTC
Root cause : The cause of this incident is a circuit breaker that tripped.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Apr 26, 14:16 UTC
Identified - Update : The cause of this incident is a circuit breaker that tripped. Our teams have reset the circuit breaker, most of the servers are UP.
Our teams are taking care of the still impacted servers.

Apr 26, 14:11 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 26/04/2023 13:13 UTC
Service impact : Servers in the rack R821L13 are no longer responding.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.

Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Apr 26, 09:28 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 26/04/2023 08:00 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in the rack G262E03 are down.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
